string-array.name: note
string-array.item: As of June 24th, 2015, Material Glass has become the first app to support both CM themes and the layers plugin. Please note that this is largely a WIP, and that bugs may arise. Make sure you know how to remove a layer in case bootloops happen, as I only have one device to test!

string-array.name: v36
string-array.item: Settings: support AOSIP icon and custom colors

string-array.name: v35
string-array.item: Layers: Fixed naming so zip installs properly
Layers: Added complete ripples to pre lollipop
Layers: Themed more core styles and drawables
Layers: Moved nav bar icons to separate layers (uninstall if you have your own custom ones)

string-array.name: v34
string-array.item: App: removed dependency for balysv ripples
LAYERS SUPPORT - get the new layers manager and check it out!

string-array.name: v33
string-array.item: App: finally fixed donations, donating once will unlock a secret feature
App: FAB will not appear unless supported (you can always apply via the actual theme chooser)
App: cleaned up manifest, unnecessary colors, and other parts
Settings: fixed white fab (ie in blacklisting)

string-array.name: v32
string-array.item: Google Drive: moved to play store build

string-array.name: v30
string-array.item: Google Services: redo, sign in dialog text is now visible
Gmail: various fixes plus attempt to change white background for tablets

string-array.name: v29
string-array.item: Fixed crashes for play store version

Notice: from now on, I will only be pushing updates to the play store in increments of 0.x, rather than 0.0.x. All additional builds in between will be hosted on androidfilehost as xda versions. As much as I love to publicize my apps, it seems as though I am prone to errors with multiple build flavours and many more individual packages. Though I generally fix these issues within 24 hours, it still doesn\'t seem to be enough for this community. So in essence, I will be updating more frequently on xda, where responses are more constructive than damaging, and actually help bring this project forwards.

string-array.name: v28
string-array.item: Play store: redid appcompats, themed more icons

string-array.name: v27
string-array.item: Framework: revert actionbar theming for compatibility
Framework: themed zen icons for Euphoria\'s power menu
Theme: appcompat fixes all over the place
MMS: added bliss + cyanogenmod caf colors (did not test as I don\'t use bliss)
Kernel Adiutor: fixed fab + style redo
Swype: moved to main production (only material dark is themed)

string-array.name: v26
string-array.item: UI: added more credits + team blackout card (only visible if you haven\'t downloaded it yet)
UI: FAB directly goes to Material Glass in the theme chooser (thanks Ivon)
Nova Launcher: fixed white idle background
UI: Fixed ipples for icon section

string-array.name: v25
string-array.item: Google +: moved xda version to play store build

string-array.name: v24
string-array.item: UI: rebased to Paperboard v7 + lots of other fixes
Framework:: fixed dark overflow on light themes
Google Services: fixed some white backgrounds (xda)

string-array.name: v23
string-array.item: Settings: Removed some teal (add qs tiles)
Settings: Fixed up battery chart section
Settings: Storage section colors now translucent
Google Services: Merged with common folders for fixes (xda alpha)
Gmail: Fixed up cache colors (now solid black)

string-array.name: v22
string-array.item: Framework: Added proper ripples for holo actionbars
DocumentsUI: Fully themed (based off of Euphoria)
Gmail: Lots of fixes (widget is now clear!)
SystemUI: Fixed battery circle base color

string-array.name: v21
string-array.item: New: Themed relay for reddit (free and pro)
New: Themed adobe acrobat (in xda beta version)

string-array.name: v20
string-array.item: SystemMUI: Made quick settings slightly darker
UI: Borderless ripples in icon section
Dialer and Contacts: Fixed nav button issues

string-array.name: v18
string-array.item: Quick fix for theme error (sorry guys)

string-array.name: v17
string-array.item: Nova: Fixed icon picker crash (white on white though)

string-array.name: v16
string-array.item: Framework: Reverted material light text colors
Removed Relay for reddit (reddit news) for now

string-array.name: v15
string-array.item: vXDA: Modified google + to be more dependent on app compat

string-array.name: v14
string-array.item: UI: Add credits to donation lib

string-array.name: v13
string-array.item: Fixed loading issues with wallpapers and icons (thanks to PaperBoard)

string-array.name: v12
string-array.item: Brand new UI! (WIP, please don\'t submit bug reports yet)

string-array.name: v11
string-array.item: Tested and working on android 5.1 (euphoria, hammerhead)
Check xda version for themed google +!

string-array.name: v10
string-array.item: Colored FAB for dialer and contacts

string-array.name: v8
string-array.item: Added ripples to a lot of areas

string-array.name: v7
string-array.item: Themed emergency dial and mobile networks, plus a bit more
Potential fix for dialog pop ups showing just the wallpaper
Added FAB in the app to launch the theme chooser (thanks Ivon)

string-array.name: v6
string-array.item: Removed dialer and contact theming (too buggy, use the xda version if you want it)

string-array.name: v5
string-array.item: Fixed issue with primary light text
Improved on gmail, more transparency and black dropdown
Downsized the bootanimation in hopes of supporting phones with hdpi and under (you can still get the xxhdpi version on android file host)

string-array.name: v2
string-array.item: Made google now drawer text a bit lighter

string-array.name: v0
string-array.item: January 15th, 2015: Theme Engine is merged into CyanogenMod 12.0
January 20th, 2015: Material Glass appears in the Play Store
